main.name: Yuva Phalle
main.bio:
MSc in Information Security with 3+ Years of Coding experience using various Technologies, an excellence seeker, perfectionist and a passionate learner. Believes in Clean Coding, Test Driven Secure Development along with Information Risk Management.
 Currently working at Hacking Lab as Hacking Lab Challenge Developer.

education.degree: Master of Computer Science and Software Engineering
Master of Science in Information Security

work.title: Hacking-Lab Challenge Developer
work.description: Challenge Development: Conception, development and integration of new cyber security challenges. Testing: Quality control of own, existing and third-party security challenges. Implementation of remote or on-site capture-the-flag events and cyber security training.Support Hacking-Lab users via Discord, Chat, Mail or Jira. Recording videos of walkthroughs and hacking tutorials.
